metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18030 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The cirrus_invalidate_region function in hw/display/cirrus_vga.c in Qemu allows local OS guest privileged users to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds array access and QEMU process crash) via vectors related to negative pitch.

criterions.comment: qemu package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.11+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
